body_html:
Yes, tf will recognize that g is the second output from softmax_cross_entropy and do the right thing.

Thought note that tf only takes gradients WRT scalars, not WRT arbitrary tensors so this won't give you the full hessian matrix.

body:
Yes, tf will recognize that g is the second output from softmax_cross_entropy and do the right thing.

Thought note that tf only takes gradients WRT scalars, not WRT arbitrary tensors so this won't give you the full hessian matrix.
